components.name: HBase Sink
components.description: This sink writes data to HBase. The Hbase configuration is picked up from the first hbase-site.xml encountered in the classpath. A class implementing HbaseEventSerializer which is specified by the configuration is used to convert the events into HBase puts and/or increments. These puts and increments are then written to HBase. This sink provides the same consistency guarantees as HBase, which is currently row-wise atomicity. In the event of Hbase failing to write certain events, the sink will replay all events in that transaction.

table.name: Table
table.description: The name of the table in Hbase to write to.

columnFamily.name: Column family
columnFamily.description: The column family in Hbase to write to.

zookeeperQuorum.name: Zookeeper quorum
zookeeperQuorum.description: The quorum spec. This is the value for the property hbase.zookeeper.quorum in hbase-site.xml

znodeParent.name: Znode parent
znodeParent.description: The base path for the znode for the -ROOT- region. Value of zookeeper.znode.parent in hbase-site.xml

batchSize.name: Batch size
batchSize.description: Number of events to be written per txn.

coalesceIncrements.name: Coalesce increments
coalesceIncrements.description: The directory where files will be stored

kerberosPrincipal.name: Kerberos principal
kerberosPrincipal.description: Kerberos user principal for accessing secure HBase

kerberosKeytab.description: Kerberos keytab for accessing secure HBase
